companies.title: BSIT Student
tasks: Created simple projects using Laravel and Laravel Inertia with Vue.js, focusing on basic functionality and learning the integration between frontend and backend.
Experimented with React.js in small parts of my projects to improve my skills and understand how it works in web development.
Developed a small game project in Java to practice programming concepts and enhance my understanding of game development.
Worked with classmates on projects, sharing tasks like coding, testing, and debugging to complete our assignments.
Focused on making my projects efficient and easy to use by applying what I learned in my classes.
